DataElement.preferredName: Image Processing Z-Stack True False Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response of true or false to indicate if a digital image processing method which combines multiple images taken at different focal distances to create a composite image with a greater depth of field than a single image was used.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The use of data processing systems to analyze, enhance, interpret or display digital images._A digital image processing method which combines multiple images taken at different focal distances to create a composite image with a greater depth of field than is possible for a single image.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The use of data processing systems to analyze, enhance, interpret or display digital images.

Concepts.definition: The use of data processing systems to analyze, enhance, interpret or display digital images.

Property.preferredDefinition: A digital image processing method which combines multiple images taken at different focal distances to create a composite image with a greater depth of field than is possible for a single image.

Concepts.definition: A digital image processing method which combines multiple images taken at different focal distances to create a composite image with a greater depth of field than is possible for a single image.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 2/25/22 jk apprvd by SME, released for SRRS imaging data set. 9/27/21 jk HTAN Level 2 imaging data element, created for SRRS imaging data set.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A response of true or false._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not in accordance with the fact or reality or definitive criteria.

Concepts.definition: Not in accordance with facts, reality or definitive criteria.

Concepts.definition: Conforming to facts, reality or definitive criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2/25/22 jk apprvd by SME, released for SRRS imaging data set. 9/24/21 jk HTAN Level 2 imaging data element, created for SRRS imaging data set.

DataElement.changeDescription: 3/1/22 jk Chg RS to Qualified for HTAN CDE. 2/25/22 jk apprvd by SME, released for SRRS imaging data set. 10/5/21 jk added Alt Name and HTAN Imaging CSI.  9/27/21 jk HTAN Level 2 imaging data element, created for SRRS imaging data set.
